artist: Artist: Matt Howarth; Publisher: Vortex Comics, Toronto
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of two figures with guns and third wearing a dress, with text and designs printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 24 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography; bound volume
title: Post Bros., no. 7
